name: Oliver's Adventure
description:
Play as a little Yorkie named Oliver. Oliver is a brave and greedy little boy,

but his evil brother Dax, is cowardly, but smart. Oliver is the favorite child, but Dax is unaccepting of this. When they grow up, Dax decides to take over the world, so he can be the favorite. Oliver, however, decides to take a stand and stop his brother's evil plan. Can he do it? Will he stop Dax in time? Quit hounding me and purchase now*!

Due to limitations, the game will be split into many chapters. Your progress will be saved though, with the power of save codes! This will be fixed later, don't worry.

Oliver's Adventure is still in development, sadly. BUT, do not fret! I the demo is out! But for now, follow me for more Oliver's Adventure, stuff and other cool games!
